body.p:
State of Kentucky
McLean County } Sct

I Douglas Little presiding Judge for McLean county ^Kentucky^ do solemnly do swear that I certify that John J. Washer ^personally^ appeared before me and took the following oath To Wit: I John J. Washer do solemnly do swear that I will faithfully support the constitution of the United State and the constitution of Kentucky and will discharge all and singular the duties appertaining to the office of Second Lieutenant in the Volunteer Militia agreeably to the law and general regulations and will obey such orders and instructions as I shall from time to time receive from the proper officers
Which is hereby certified to General head Quarters.
Given under my hand at Calhoon Ky this 23rd day of November 1861

Douglas Little
P. J. McLean County
